RHQ Agent Plugin Plugin
Last Published: 2013-10-17  | Version: 0.3
RHQ Agent Plugin Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

rhq-agent:rhq-agent-plugin-validate

Full name:

org.rhq.maven.plugins:rhq-agent-plugin-plugin:0.3:rhq-agent-plugin-validate

Description:

Validates a freshly built RHQ Agent Plugin.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: package.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
rhqVersion String - Version of the RHQ Plugin Container API

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
failOnError boolean - Whether to fail the build if an error occurs while validating the plugin.
Default value is: true.

Parameter Details

failOnError:

Whether to fail the build if an error occurs while validating the plugin.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

rhqVersion:

Version of the RHQ Plugin Container API
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
